name: Law Mower
description: Law Mower is a game about one man's journey to achieve his life's purpose - to cut every blade of grass in the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB of video memory Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for online play
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core i7 Graphics: GeForce GT 630M or equivalent
